entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low.
